faq.whatIsAnswer: Our platform is an interactive learning environment that uses game elements, such as points, achievements, and challenges, to motivate students to learn. Teachers create personalized trails to engage students.
faq.howCreateAnswer: Teachers have access to an exclusive panel where they can create learning modules, add activities, videos, quizzes, and configure difficulty levels. Trails can be adapted for different objectives and teaching styles.
faq.rewardsAnswer: Yes! Students earn points by completing activities, can unlock achievements, and advance in a level system. This encourages them to continue learning while having fun.
faq.subjectsAnswer: The platform supports any subject! Teachers can create trails in mathematics, sciences, languages, history, among others. The content is fully customizable.
faq.payment: Is it necessary to pay to use the platform?
faq.paymentAnswer: The platform has a free plan with basic resources and premium plans that offer additional functionalities, such as advanced reports, priority support, and personalization tools.
